content:
# The furnace has successfully processed 4 copper plates from the copper ore, and the final inventory of the furnace reflects:
# - 4 copper plates produced

# My updated inventory now remains unchanged since I did not extract the copper plates yet:
# - 4 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 7 iron plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 2 electronic circuits

# The furnace is currently idle with 27 units of coal left and no ingredients to smelt.

# Now that I have 4 copper plates produced, I can extract them from the furnace and add them to my inventory.

extract_item(Prototype.CopperPlate, target=furnace_info.position, quantity=4)  # Extract the 4 copper plates from the furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after extracting the copper plates.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
